comments.body: I added these for someone else to try and test. The types are never resolved for me without using the `declare module "handsontable" { }`.
I would love some help to address this requested change.
Explanatory comment related to the use of two namespaces. I couldn't find a more recent resolution to the referenced issue.
I found a way to reduce the class definition.

The underlying source code defines a `Handsontable.Core` class that is returned by the `Handsontable` top-level class/function. I think this definition file better reflects the underlying source code.
